child.pub-comments: Hayes references this dialect as discussed in Jean N. Cheon 1905, though he does not include it in his final classification of Vietic languages and dialects on pages 220-221 (1992).
child.publications: Hayes, La Vaughn H. 1992. Vietic and Viet-Muong: a new subgrouping in Mon-Khmer, The Mon-Khmer Studies Journal, vol. 21, 211-228.

child.pub-comments: "Muong Oy Lo is omitted because the lexical data in Maspero 1912 suggest that it is only a very divergent dialect of Muong" (Hayes 1992:221).
child.publications: Hayes, La Vaughn H. 1992. Vietic and Viet-Muong: a new subgrouping in Mon-Khmer, The Mon-Khmer Studies Journal, vol. 21, 211-228.

child.pub-comments: Hayes mentions this dialect several times throughout his article, though he does not include it in his final classification of Vietic languages and dialects on pages 220-221 (1992).
